qas.question: What is the army replacing divisions with?
How will the brigades be structured?
What is the Coast Guard replacing divisions with?
How will the brigades be deconstructed?
Who can command any branch of the Army?

context: The army is also changing its base unit from divisions to <a0_0><b3_0>brigades<b3_0/><a0_0/>. <b6_0>Division lineage<b6_0/> will be retained, but the <a2_0><b5_0>divisional headquarters<b5_0/><a2_0/> will be able to command any brigade, not just brigades that carry their divisional lineage. The central part of this plan is that each brigade will be <a1_0><b4_0>modular<b4_0/><a1_0/>, i.e., all brigades of the same type will be exactly the same, and thus any brigade can be commanded by any division.
